name: Xiaokui Xiao
content: Xiaokui XIAO's Homepage Home Publications / Code Research Group Honors Services Contact Xiaokui XIAO COM 1, #03-25 School of Computing National University of Singapore 13 Computing Drive Singapore 117417 Email: Bio I am a professor and Deputy Head (Research and Graduate Matters) at the Department of Computer Science, National University of Singapore (NUS). I obtained a PhD in Computer Science from the Chinese University of Hong Kong in 2008. Before joining NUS in 2018, I was an associate professor at the Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. I am an IEEE Fellow and an ACM Distinguished Member. I received the 2024 ACM SIGMOD Test of Time Award, the 2022 ACM SIGMOD Research Highlight Award, and the VLDB 2021 Best Research Paper Award. I am a trustee of the VLDB Endowment (2022-present). My Google Scholar profile: Research Interests My research focuses on data management and analysis, with special interests in two topics: Privacy-preserving data management. Recent interests: differential privacy, privacy in large language models (LLMs) Algorithms and systems for large data analysis. Recent interests: social network analysis, large data analysis with LLMs News I am looking for research assistants, PhD students, and postdocs. Please send me your CV if you are interested.
